p.login.title: Login to Account
p.login.title.sub: Please enter your registered email address and registered password.
p.login.sns.title: Log in with your SNS account
p.login.signup.title: Don't have an Smart Ecommerce account ?
p.register.title: Create an Account
p.register.title.sub: Please enter your country of residence and mobile phone number (SMS available).
p.register.link.title: Already have an Smart Ecommerce account
p.sms.register.title.sub: Please enter the 6-digit security code sent by SMS to your registered smartphone to confirm your phone number.
p.sms.register.note: If you do not receive the SMS properly, please contact our support desk.
p.regist.info.title.sub: Please enter the registration username, email address, and password.
p.regist.info.checkbox1: I fully understand and agree to Terms and Conditions of Smart Ecommerce.
p.regist.info.checkbox2: I agree that my information will be used in accordance with the Privacy Policy.
c.header.logout.content: Log out of the Smart Ecommerce.
c.sidebar.comp: Ecommerce cnb Ltd. All rights reserved.
l.layout.avatar.title: Change Avatar
l.layout.avatar.content: Your profile picture will be changed. Upload a picture and click "Confirm".
l.layout.avatar.drop: Drag and drop avatar here, or click to select files
p.security.description: When you perform important operations such as changing registration information, you can use any of the following authentication methods to prevent operations by impersonators.
c.twofa.pass.description: You will be asked to re-enter your login password when you perform important operations.
c.twofa.sms.description: When you perform an important operation, a message with a 6-digit authentication code will be sent to your authenticated registered phone number, and you will be asked to enter the authentication code for added security.
c.twofa.app.description: You can install Google Authenticator on your smartphone and enter the 6-digit authentication code displayed on the authentication app when performing important operations for added security
p.profile.setting.title: Profile infomation
p.profile.setting.description: User can change Profile infomation here and after change infomation will update
p.profile.setting.modal.email.title: New email
p.profile.setting.modal.email.des: Please enter new email and click "Confirm"
p.profile.setting.modal.email.exist: Email exist in system, please enter other email
p.profile.setting.modal.email.success: We will confirm your registration details and send you a URL to confirm new email. Please click on the URL in the email to confirm email within 30 minutes.
c.success.title: has been submitted successfully.
